publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4476 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Human Organ and Tissue Live Transplants (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Human Organ and Tissue Live Transplants (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-4476 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Human Organ and Tissue Live Transplants (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Human Organ and Tissue Live Transplants (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
